name: LazyEditor
headline: AI Agentic Video Editor
description: LazyEditor is an AI-driven video editor that instantly handles the entire editing process, from removing silences and filler words to adding b-rolls and enhancing overall quality. We help content creators produce professional, high-quality videos that maximize engagement with minimal effort.

founders.name: Akash Gupta, Founder
founders.description: After graduating as an Engineer, I worked in trading and research at RBC Capital Markets. In my free time, I enjoy drinking coffee at SF's amazing cafes and playing Basketball and binge watching brain dead TV like Love is Blind (please don't judge :p). I love making new friends and would love to meet you over coffee or co-work.

founders.name: Nikhil Kulkarni, Founder
founders.description: Started coding in high school by making little CLI games and iOS apps. Previously worked at Snapchat as a software engineer. Love building impactful products.

# Boost Engagement: Edit like the Pros in Two Clicks
[Edit for Free Now](https://www.lazyeditor.ai/</upload>)
600+
Human Editing Hours Saved
## How Does LazyEditor Work?
Instantly boost views, engagement, and retention of your videos.
### ‚úçÔ∏è Good Looking Captions
Instantly add **proven** caption styles to make your videos more engaging and accessible.
### üèûÔ∏è Relevant B-Rolls
We look up **relevant** visuals, b-rolls and infographics to make the video's message more effective.
### ‚úÇÔ∏è Multiple Clips
Just upload multiple raw clips and we will **stitch them together**. Say goodbye to importing one raw clip at a time.
### üé∂ Background Music
We understand the emotions you are trying to evoke and automatically pick **copyright free** music to enhance the mood and effectiveness of the video.
### ‚úèÔ∏è Edit by Transcript
Edit your video timeline with ease‚Äîjust like editing a document. Cut, trim, and organize clips effortlessly.
### üåç Share & Gather Feedback
Share your video link in our Discord, filled with a community of other creators to discover best practices. We want to help you get your next 10k followers.
[Edit for Free Now](https://www.lazyeditor.ai/</upload>)
## Join thousands of Creators using LazyEditor!
![Blayne Oliver](https://ai-video-editor-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/2158940-uxx9_big.png)
### Blayne Oliver
@blayno_mtops
Lazyeditor is exactly what I was looking for. I am a longform content creator, posting daily market updates twice a day, so I dont have time to edit shortform videos. Thanks to Lazyeditor.ai I am able to make a quick raw video and let Lazyeditor.ai do the rest. What would have take me additional hours out of my day to do, I can now complete the full process in under 30 minutes per video...that includes the recording time. I am really impressed and look to use Lazyeditor.ai for as long as I make short form videos. Compliments to the geniuses that made this possible
![Luis Enriquez](https://ai-video-editor-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/3549b8106028641fb03b4f40066ebcba~c5_1080x1080.jpeg)
### Luis Enriquez
@luis_enriquez_98
It is cool and really helpful for content creators, I am using it for my brand new Tik Tok profile in English
![Abdul Rahman](https://www.lazyeditor.ai/abdul.png)
### Abdul Rahman
WHAT THE HECK. That's so coool.

generated_description:
**LazyEditor: Simplifying Video Editing with AI**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, **LazyEditor** is carving out a niche in the world of video editing. Located in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, this innovative company operates with a compact team of just three individuals.

**Mission: Empowering Creators with AI**

LazyEditor‚Äôs mission is straightforward yet powerful: to be an AI-driven video editing assistant that does the hard work for you. Gone are the days when you‚Äôd have to spend hours trimming silences, cutting filler words, or adding b-rolls to your video content. LazyEditor automates these processes to help content creators produce professional-quality videos quickly and efficiently, ultimately maximizing engagement.

**How Does It Work?**

The platform is designed for simplicity and effectiveness. Here's a snapshot of what LazyEditor offers:

- **Effortless Editing**: Just upload your raw clips, and LazyEditor takes care of stitching them together, allowing you to focus on content.
- **Smart Captions**: Proven caption styles are added automatically to enhance accessibility and viewer engagement.
- **Curated B-Rolls**: It intelligently fetches relevant visuals and infographics to back up your video's message.
- **Copyright-Free Music**: The AI automatically selects the right background music to set the mood.
- **Transcript Editing**: You can edit your video timeline as easily as editing text, making it intuitive for anyone.
- **Community Engagement**: Share your work in a dedicated Discord channel to gather feedback and tips from fellow creators.

**Target Audience**

LazyEditor is particularly helpful for content creators engaging in short-form video, like TikTok or YouTube Shorts. Testimonials highlight how users have saved significant editing hours, allowing them to produce more content in less time‚Äîa game-changer for busy creators.

**Community and Support**

Beyond the technology, LazyEditor is fostering a community where users can exchange ideas and strategies, seeking to help them grow their audiences significantly. 

If you‚Äôre tired of spending endless hours editing your videos and are looking for a smoother, more efficient process, head over to [LazyEditor](https://www.lazyeditor.ai/) and experience the benefits of AI-powered video editing for yourself. 

In an era where content is king, LazyEditor is positioning itself to be a vital tool for creators, saving time and enhancing productivity. So, if you‚Äôre a passionate creator ready to ramp up your video production without the headache of traditional editing, LazyEditor just might be your new best friend.
